sentence.Network_en: He stood in front of the shop with arms akimbo.
sentence.Network_cn: 他两手叉腰,站在铺子前.

sentence.Network_en: As follows: legs open, shoulder width, arms akimbo.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法如下: 两脚开立, 与肩同宽, 双手叉腰.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “叉”字的解释 - 新华字典网络版·汉字字典频道 ... 叉手〖 cuponehandintheotherbeforethechest〗 叉腰〖 akimbo〗 叉鱼〖 spearfish〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... akene 瘦果 akimbo 两手叉腰的 akin 同族的.
每日雅思词汇：各种姿势和动作_无忧雅思网 ... nod 点头; akimbo 双手叉腰; trip over 绊倒.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from in kenebowe in Middle English , probably from Old Norse

entry.def: If you stand arms akimbo or with arms akimbo, you stand with your hands on your hips and your elbows pointing outwards.

means.word_mean: 1. (used of arms and legs) bent outward with the joint away from the body;
1. with hands on hips and elbows extending outward;

auth_sentence.content: Seeing those trees go off lonely and akimbo on one flatbed truck was like witnessing a slave auction of my friends.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seeing those trees go off lonely and akimbo on one flatbed truck was like witnessing a slave auction of my friends.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seeing those trees go off lonely and akimbo on one flatbed truck was like witnessing a slave auction of my friends.
